Richmond.Agecroft Hall: Agecroft Hall is a Tudor manor house and estate located at 4305 Sulgrave Road. on the James River in the Windsor Farms neighborhood of Richmond, Virginia, United States. The manor house was built in the late 15th century, and was originally located in the Irwell Valley at Agecroft, Pendlebury, then in the historic county of Lancashire, England, but by the 20th century it was unoccupied and in a state of disrepair.
